name: EUROPEAN AVIATION SCHOOL OF BARCELONA, S.L
about: EUROPEAN AVIATION SCHOOL OF BARCELONA, S.L. (EAS Barcelona) is a premier aviation training institution located in Barcelona, Spain. With a mission to guide students in becoming professional airline pilots, EAS Barcelona combines advanced theory with intensive flight practices and utilizes a modern fleet of Tecnam aircraft. The school offers integrated and modular ATPL courses, as well as specialized training in areas such as UPRT, MCC, and flight instructor courses. EAS Barcelona is recognized for its quality training, having graduated over 2,000 pilots and accumulated over 250,000 hours of flight instruction. The school's experienced team and commitment to integrating new technologies ensure students are well-prepared for careers in commercial aviation. EAS Barcelona is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a comprehensive and high-quality aviation education.
services:
["PPL (Private Pilot) Course
ATPL(A) Theoretical Modular Course
Time Building
Visual night course VFRN
CR(MEP) multi-engine class qualification course
IR(MEP) instrument flight course
CPL(A) commercial pilot course"]
